review_data.title: Hidden gem
review_data.content: This centrally located (near Limmatplatz) Pizzeria, ticks all the boxes. Super friendly and attentive service in a comforting environment. Great Italian food as you would expect at such a pleasant place, dont miss to pay this small restaurant a visit!

review_data.title: so delicious
review_data.content: so incredibly good. very reasonable for pricing in zurich! and portions are large! you can share meals (or get your own and have left overs :) ). service was so great, we enjoyed ourselves and would definitely go back.

review_data.title: gemütlich und fein

review_data.title: Ideal for lunch
review_data.content: We were at Riviera with a group of colleagues. The food was perfect, and served quickly. The waiters were very friendly and helpful. Can recommend this place, it is located close to Limmatplatz at Langstrasse.

review_data.title: Homemade pasta

Auch das a la carte essen ist gut. Gut versteckt, ein bisschen ein Geheimtip. Nicht überteuert und gutes essen. Ich komme gerne wieder...More
